p: The flavonoids selected for the permeability assay showed apparent permeability coefficient values in the range of 1.17 (±0.128) × 10 –6 to 36.6 (±3.2) × 10 –6 cm/s ( Table 1 and Figure 4 ). A comparison of the P app values of propranolol and fluorescein showed that the majority of the flavonoids exhibited moderate to high monolayer permeability.
